Rulings.Cat:
● Removing 1 Plant in your GY from play is a cost.
● 'Black Rose Dragon's' second effect targets 1 monster your opponent controls.
● If the monster targeted by 'Black Rose Dragon's' second effect isn't changed to Attack Position by 'Black Rose Dragon's' effect, its ATK isn't reduced to 0.
● If you target a face-down Defense Position monster, its Flip Effect will activate after 'Black Rose Dragon's' effect resolves.
● After a monster's ATK is reduced to 0 by 'Black Rose Dragon's' second effect, if another effect increases its ATK it will be applied to the 0 ATK.
● If 'Black Rose Dragon' activates its first effect, it is also destroyed.

Rulings.Base:
1. Removing 1 Plant-Type monster in your GY from play is a cost.
2. The second effect of "Black Rose Dragon" targets 1 monster your opponent controls.
3. If the monster targeted by the second effect of "Black Rose Dragon" is not changed to Attack Position by the effect of "Black Rose Dragon", its ATK is not reduced to 0.
4. If you target a face-down Defense Position monster, its Flip Effect will activate after the effect of "Black Rose Dragon" resolves.
5. After a monster's ATK is reduced to 0 by the second effect of "Black Rose Dragon", if another effect increases its ATK it will be applied to the 0 ATK.
6. If "Black Rose Dragon" activates its first effect, it is also destroyed.
